display_name: Indicator for insomnia symptoms
description: Calculated: If any of the four insomnia symptoms (i.e. difficulty falling asleep, difficulty falling back to sleep, waking up frequently, waking up too early) have a frequency of more than 5-15 time a month, then 1: yes.
calculation: 1=Yes if Y any of the following were a 3 or 4 (ps_diff, ps_backsleep, ps_wakerepeat, ps_tooearly), 0=all 4 variables were 0, 1, or 2

display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Total score
description:
Calculated - Total score based on an 8-item questionnaires ranking likelihood of dozing off Johns MW 1991 (PubMed ID: 1798888). Scale 0-3 for individual items; 0 to 24 for overall score.

[Search for all ESS variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/wsc/variables?search=epworth)

display_name: Mean of neck girth measures
Count of frequent insomnia symptoms
description: Calculated: Count the number of insomnia symptoms (i.e. difficulty falling asleep, difficulty falling back to sleep, waking up frequently, waking up too early) with a frequency of more than 5-15 time a month.
calculation: Count of the number of the following at a 3 or 4 (ps_diff, ps_backsleep, ps_wakerepeat, ps_tooearly), 0=all 4 variables were 0, 1, or 2

display_name: Total days per month having any insomnia symptoms
description: Calculated: Sum of responses to insomnia symptoms (i.e. difficulty falling asleep, difficulty falling back to sleep, waking up frequently, waking up too early) where 0=0, 1=1, 2=3, 3=10, 4=25
calculation: Sum of responses to (ps_diff, ps_backsleep, ps_wakerepeat, ps_tooearly) where 0=0, 1=1, 2=3, 3=10, 4=25

display_name: Alcohol consumption, none
description: If you do not drink alcoholic beverages at all check here ____

description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events during NREM sleep

display_name: Sleep Efficiency: the proportion of sleep duration in in-bed period from type I polysomnography
description: Sleep duration is the interval between sleep onset time and lights on/out-bed time while asleep (i.e. total sleep time, TST), while in-bed period is the interval between lights off/in-bed time and lights on/out-bed time (i.e. time in bed, TIB).

calculation: if smoke=N then smoker=0, else if smoke_curr=N then smoker=1

display_name: Snoring frequency
description: According to what others have told you or to your own awareness, how often do you snore?

display_name: Snoring volume
description: How loud do you think, or have others said, your snoring is?

display_name: State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (State Anxiety Subscale) Score
description: Sum of 20 items from State Anxiety Questionnaire. When there are 2 or less missing, the average of all of the other scores are used to create the sum variable

display_name: Stimulant: Self-reported use
description: Self reported drugs at PSG visit, open text then grouped according to effect

display_name: Stroke: Self-reported year of diagnosis
description: If yes, indicate how many years ago ____ or the year ____ you were diagnosed. (if stroke?="Y")

display_name: Stroke: Self-reported diagnosis by a physician
description: The next section asks about specific medical problems. Please indicate if you have been told by a doctor that you have or have had any of these conditions.:  stroke? ___Yes       ___No

display_name: Thyroid Medication: Self-reported use
description: Self reported drugs at PSG visit, open text then grouped according to effect

display_name: Thyroid Disorder: Self-reported type
description: Also, describe the type of thyroid problem

display_name: Thyroid Disorder: Self-reported year of diagnosis
description: If yes, indicate how many years ago ____ or the year ____ you were diagnosed. (if Thyroid problem? ="Y")

display_name: Thyroid Disorder: Self-reported diagnosis by a physician
description: The next section asks about specific medical problems. Please indicate if you have been told by a doctor that you have or have had any of these conditions.:  Thyroid problem? ___Yes       ___No

display_name: Last menstrual period
description: Difference between date of reported last menstrual period and sleep study date in years

display_name: Total cholesterol
description: Measure of total cholesterol level in blood

display_name: Self-reported daily sleep duration in main sleep
description: Calculated - Weighted average of weekday and weekend self-reported sleep duration in main sleeps

display_name: Self-reported daily sleep duration in main sleep and naps combined
description: Calculated - Weighted average of weekday and weekend self-reported sleep duration in main sleeps and naps combined

display_name: Trait Anxiety Score
description: Sum of 20 items from Trait Anxiety Questionnaire. When there are 2 or less missing, the average of all of the other scores are used to create the sum variable

display_name: Triglycerides
description: Measure of triglyceride level in blood

display_name: Self-reported sleep latency
description: About how many minutes does it usually take you to fall asleep at night? _____#minutes

display_name: Total Sleep Duration: the interval between sleep onset time and lights on/out-bed time while the participant is asleep from type I polysomnography
description: Conventionally, this would be called total sleep time (TST) (i.e. total time spent in stage 1 or greater).

display_name: Total Sleep Duration (NREM): the interval between sleep onset time and lights on/out-bed time while the participant is in NREM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: Total time spent in NREM sleep

display_name: Total Sleep Duration (REM): the interval between sleep onset time and lights on/out-bed time while the participant is in REM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: Total time spent in REM sleep

display_name: Uric acid
description: Measure of uric acid level in blood

display_name: Year of polysomnography data collection
First measurement of waist girth
description: With participant standing erect with arms at side and abdomen relaxed, measure at the smallest circumference near the navel and above the pelvis at the natural waistline. If no obvious waist, measure at the navel

display_name: Second measurement of waist girth
description: With participant standing erect with arms at side and abdomen relaxed, measure at the smallest circumference near the navel and above the pelvis at the natural waistline. If no obvious waist, measure at the navel

display_name: Mean of waist girth measurements
Waist to hip ratio
Wake After Sleep Onset: the total duration between sleep onset and lights-on/out-bed time while being awake from type I polysomnography
Self-reported weekend sleep duration in main sleep
description: How many hours of sleep do you usually get during: a weekend or non worknight

display_name: Weight
description: Record weight to the nearest 0.5 kg on mechanical beam scale.

display_name: Alcohol consumption, number of glasses of wine per week
description: Please estimate your usual consumption of alcoholic beverages,How many glasses of wine might you have per week?

display_name: Self-reported weekday sleep duration in main sleep
description: How many hours of sleep do you usually get during: workday night

display_name: Unique identifier
description: Randomly generated

display_name: Study visit number
description: Sequential visit

display_name: Standardized Zung Depression Scale Total Score
description: Scaled Zung Depression Scale score used with clinical cutpoints

display_name: Zung Depression Scale Total Score
description: Sum of 20 items from the Zung Depression Scale
